channel.title: Posts on André Moraes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on André Moraes

item.title: Navigating the Personalization Landscape: A Case for Next.js Static Site Generation with Sitecore XM Cloud
item.description: Explore the power of Next.js Static Site Generation in a integration with Sitecore XM Cloud. Uncover the benefits of personalized user experiences while overcoming the challenges of server-side rendering.

item.title: Seamless Integration of Sitecore Content Hub With Next.js Using Reverse Proxy Calls
item.description: Reverse proxy calls streamline the integration of Sitecore Content Hub with Next.js, enhancing security and simplifying the process.

item.title: Get site context item in JSS API and GraphQL calls
item.description: How to get corresponding site context item in JSS API and GraphQL calls.
